subject: p19991135
History: Emphysema. After EBUS. Rule out pneumothorax.
Impression: AP chest compared to : There is no pneumothorax, pleural effusion or evidence of hemorrhage in the lung or mediastinum. Emphysema is severe. Heart size is normal. The complex of nodule and large bullae in the axillary region of the right upper lobe is essentially unchanged.
